thread.title: China arrests hackers at US request
thread.title_full: China arrests hackers at US request | News24

author: news24.com
title: China arrests hackers at US request
text:
Washington - The Chinese government took unprecedented action by complying with a US request and arresting hackers suspected of stealing secrets from US companies to pass to Chinese state-run companies, the Washington Post reported on Friday.
The arrests came in September before Chinese President Xi Jinping went to Washington for talks with US President Barack Obama that included one of the most contentious issues between the two countries - corporate and government cyber espionage.
The Post, which cited sources speaking anonymously because of the sensitivity of the matter, said US intelligence and law enforcement officials presented China with a list of hackers.
Publicly tried
